title: Facile synthesis of a rod-like Ni/TiO2/C nanocomposite for enhanced electromagnetic wave absorption
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8100-8107
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08689E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yu Hua, Xiaomeng Zhang, Fulin Chen, Yuantao Sun, Xinyu Wang, Ziliang Wen, Qinghao Tan, Chenxi Sun, Buhe Bateer
In this study, we utilized a simple calcination method to prepare a Ni/TiO2/C composite, which was synchronously grown from magnetic, semiconductor, and conductive materials.
